thread.title: Christophe Philippe Joel
thread.title_full: TransferWise reviewed by Christophe Philippe Joel

author: Christophe Philippe Joel
title: Christophe Philippe Joel
text: I had to transfer quickly money from France to U.K. In the most efficient way. TransferWise is second to none - easy, quick, safe, I really recommend it and I will use it again... and so much cheaper than transferring through banks!
